text:
Hello Metor,

Wish you the same (despite the very lateness). I'm doing well, trying to cope up with all the studying as well as outer activities. 

My Christmas break was very mundane as I had caught the flu which took quite some days to recover, however am doing excellent  and was able to create some handmade crafts that are to be sold in a volunteer project which I have joined.

Hoping you're doing well and had an amazing Christmas along with a wonderful start for the Year.
You're creating handmade crafts for a volunteer project? That's awesome
